TopicTitle: Struts auto-reattaching after separation then redocking in different orientation

Articles.Content:
I made an Apollo style mun mission with a single rocket containing a mun lander and return capsule vehicle.

In the VAB, I attached several 6-8 small structs to provide stability between the lander docking port / stage decoupler and the return capsule vehicle. After launching and reaching orbit, I separated the return capsule vehicle, which detached the struts as intended. Then I turned it around, and re-docked the mun lander & return capsule docking ports, After docking the struts reappeared, now going through the vehicle, and not connected in straight lines anymore. (Also side bug that is already reported is I cannot undock 2 spacecrafts = auto explosion)
